CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 咬；啃；少量食物；咬伤；辛辣味；（言辞或批评的）尖锐；（机器等的）抓地力；（昆虫的）叮咬；（鱼的）上钩；咬饵

pos_mean_info_list.mean: [计] 比特（二进位制信息单位）；少量；马嚼子；辅币；老一套
咬（bite的过去式和过去分词）
咬；抓住；刺进；欺骗（bite的ing形式）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用牙齿钳住或切断，或咬一口。

word_group.brief_definition: 硬着头皮对付不愉快的(或艰难的)情况, 咬紧牙关应付
失败, 被摧毁, 一败涂地
隐忍不言(避免祸从口出)
想一口吃成胖子；不自量力
word_group.phrase: bite off more than you can chew
bite the hand that feeds you

word_group.brief_definition: 忍住话；抑制情感的流露
跳蚤咬的红斑；小伤口；小笔花费

word_group.phrase: bite the hand that feeds one
bite off more than one can chew

word_group.brief_definition: 按捺住强烈感情；强忍住笑；强迫自己不还嘴

bilingual.source: When the wind is in the west, then the fish bite the best.
bilingual.target: 当风在西边时，鱼咬得最好。

bilingual.source: When the wind is in the east, then the fish bite the least.
bilingual.target: 当风在东边时，鱼咬得最少。

bilingual.source: If the bite is painful, give the person one or two painkillers.
bilingual.target: 如果咬伤疼痛，给人一两片止痛药。

bilingual.source: The dog tried to bite the mailman.
I watched the cat bite into the fish.

bilingual.target: 蚊子咬的地方发痒得厉害。

bilingual.source: Be careful, the snake might bite you.

list.abstract: 《BITE》是Troye Sivan演唱的一首歌曲，收录在12月4日发行专辑《WILD》中。
bite，英语单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作名词时意为“咬；一口；咬伤；刺痛，人名；(匈)比泰”，作及物动词时意为“咬；刺痛”，作不及物动词时意为“咬；刺痛”。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, show them your bite marks! Max, I'd rather not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是，给他看你的咬痕。Max 我不要。

yingyinNormal.en: They were waiting in line to bite us. Caroline, show them your bite marks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 老鼠排着队等着咬我们，Caroline 给他们看你身上的老鼠牙印。

yingyinNormal.en: Has a nasty little bite, doesn't it. It's very high tech.
yingyinNormal.zh: 像被咬了一口，是吧？高科技产品。

yingyinNormal.en: That really means a lot. Oh, and Mom, don't bite your nails.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是很大的鼓励，妈，别咬指甲。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I don't want to hit you. Oh what then? Kick me? No. Bite me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我不想打你。什么？你要踢我？不咬我？

yingyinNormal.en: If a zombie bites you, you turn into a zombie. However, if a mummy bites you, all you turn into is some schmo with a mummy bite.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你被僵尸咬了，你也会变为僵尸，但如果是木乃伊咬你，你只会变成有木乃伊咬痕的白痴。

yingyinNormal.en: Bite me, Douglas. Right. That's the way you usually attack any argument.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你咬我啊，道格拉斯。没错你对每个反对言论都是那么攻击的。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you guys stop. It's my TV. What, oh, quit it. Bite me. Oh my God.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要吵了，好不好？这是我的电视。你，住手。你咬我呀。我的天。

yingyinNormal.en: May I have one of your fries? Of course. Can I have a bite of your burger? Absolutely not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以吃一根你的薯条吗？当然可以。我可以咬一口你的汉堡吗？当然不可以。

yingyinNormal.en: Peter, you can't be doing that. It'll come back to bite us. You worry too much, Eli.
yingyinNormal.zh: 彼得，你不能这么做，它会反咬我们一口的。你担心太多了，伊莱。

yingyinNormal.en: And then we have the fer-de-lance, and this one is more aggressive because he always like to bite you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里还有矛头蛇，这种蛇更具攻击性，因为它们喜欢咬人。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Australia has a reputation as a land of creatures that bite, sting, and can even rip off your whole arm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 澳洲出名拥有不同种类的陆上生物，有咬人的，有带刺的，有的甚至可以扯下你整条手臂。

yingyinNormal.en: You can like, bite, and pull people's hair and stuff? Yeah, anything goes, except eye gouging and fish hooking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以咬人、扯别人的头发？都可以，除了戳眼睛和鱼钩手。

yingyinNormal.en: Show him your bite marks! Fine!
yingyinNormal.zh: 给他看你的伤口! 好吧!

yingyinNormal.en: Jack. Let's try a bite of it. I said, no!
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克，来尝一口。我说不要！

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, hey, Leonard. How was your date? Bite me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，莱纳德，约会怎么样哇？要你管。

yingyinNormal.en: Is everything okay? Terrific. Couldn't be better. Oh, bite me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一切都还好吗？好极了，没法再好了。你奈我何。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, looks like it's just us. Want to go get a bite?
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来只剩我们两个了，想去吃点东西吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I told you, turn them inside out. And I told you to bite me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我跟你说过了，翻过来穿就行了。然后我说我不愿意你奈我何。

yingyinNormal.en: I knew learning English would come back to bite me in the ass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就知道我迟早会栽在英语上面。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 一小口食物; 少量食物; 简单的一餐

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 咬；啃；咬住；抓地；着地不滑；咬伤；叮；蜇

word_family.mean: n. 小块；小部分；少量；比特；生殖器；嚼子；衔铁；钻子；钎头；位

sense_info_list.en: a small amount of food; a small meal
sense_info_list.zh: 一小口食物; 少量食物; 简单的一餐

examination_example.sentence: Breaking down problems into <highlight>bite</highlight>-sized chunks and using code to solve them becomes normal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将问题分解小块，并使用代码来解决这些问题成为了常态。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person or animal) use the teeth to cut into something in order to eat it

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“咬、叮刺痛”，尤指蚊虫，蜜蜂等的叮咬。
意为“咬、啃、消耗、折磨”，常指一点一点地咬掉。
意为“猛地咬住、突然咬断”。
意为“细咬、蚕食、一点一点地吃、啃”。

examination_example.sentence: If you are not careful, it'll come around and <highlight>bite</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不小心，它会过来咬你。

examination_example.sentence: In addition to <highlight>biting</highlight> ants, other species can cause different kinds of damage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了叮咬蚂蚁外，其他种类的蚂蚁也会造成不同的伤害。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指用牙齿钳住或切断，或咬一口。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: Everything that happens next during the procedure must be related to this story—an injection (注射) becomes the <highlight>bite</highlight> of an insect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在手术过程中，接下来发生的一切都必须与这个故事相关——注射变成了昆虫的叮咬。

examination_example.sentence: Campers, in my eyes, were people who enjoyed insect <highlight>bites</highlight>, ill-cooked meals, and uncomfortable sleeping bags.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我看来，露营者是会“享受”昆虫叮咬、饭菜难吃、睡袋不适的人。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指用牙齿钳住或切断，或咬一口。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 咬；啃；咬住；抓地；着地不滑；咬伤；叮；蜇

word_family.mean: n. 小块；小部分；少量；比特；生殖器；嚼子；衔铁；钻子；钎头；位

examination_example.sentence: After I left China and started my study life in Germany, I found myself always watching A <highlight>bite</highlight> of China during supper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我离开中国，开始我在德国的学习生活后，我发现自己总是在晚餐时看《舌尖上的中国》。

examination_example.sentence: Go "hand-in" to touch a shark, a crab, or thousands of tiny cleaner fish that will <highlight>bite</highlight> playfully at your fingers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去“亲手”触摸一条鲨鱼，一只螃蟹，或者成千上万只淘气地咬你手指的微小清洁鱼。

examination_example.sentence: I didn't focus on <highlight>bites</highlight>, but instead I read about how helpful ants are to the planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我没有关注蚂蚁的叮咬，而是读到了蚂蚁对地球的帮助。

examination_example.sentence: The ants attacked (攻击) him, and he was covered in terrible <highlight>bites</highlight>(咬).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蚂蚁攻击了他，他被咬得满身是伤。
